name: Virtual Soccer Zone (itch)
description:
Are you ready to challenge players from all over the world to be the first in the ranking? 

Virtual Soccer Zone is an immersive virtual reality sport game. It tests your physical endurance as well as your hand-eye coordination. 

Expect to get sweaty while competing with your friends with online leaderboards!

PLAY MODE:

  • Goalkeeper Mode: Immerse yourself in the role of the goalkeeper and block as many shots as possible

FEATURES:

  • Unique gameplay
  • High quality graphics
  • Easy to learn, difficult to master
  • Competitive Platform
  • Ideal for parties, maybe later on ;)

Virtual Soccer Zone, the soccer game for events played in stadiums around the world, is now available for Oculus Quest as a demo!

This game is in development and your feedback is much appreciated. Thanks for checking out the demo.
